data.title: The Preparation of the Critical Edition of the Treatise “On Monastic Life” by Athanasios Abu Ghalib with Russian Translation, Notes and Commentaries
data.abstractNote: The article presents the preparation of the critical edition of the treatise «On Monastic Life» by Athanasios Abu Ghalib († 1177), West Syrian theologian, bishop of Jihan, with Russian translation, notes and commentaries. Up to now the text was not edited and translated. The author provides a short survey on the sources of the edition, a brief review of the life and Church activity by Abu Ghalib in the political and historical context. The paper focuses on some theological and ascetical ideas of his monastical treatise. The author emphasizes the importance of this work as a source of theology, ascetism, monasticism, rhetoric of the West Syrian Christian tradition of 12th century.
